::Spears::

She stood for a second, shaking a little and letting her fear 
subside.  She looked at the new bots.  "Hello, I'm Spears. Nice to 
meet you two."

She put a hand on Strikers shoulder to steady herself. Her fear was 
going down, but she tols herself that she would never get used to 
flying. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker flies up to the Ark, putting Spears down and looking at 
BlueStreak 
> and Andromeda. He grins.
> 
> "Nice to meet you, Andromeda," he says, "You two been busy 
defending the Ark?"
